title: Vintage Stone Island Green Casual Puffer Jacket
description:
Vintage Stone Island Green Puffer Jacket in Size L. Made with Garment Dyed Down_26 GR X SQM_N technology, it offers a bold color, lightweight insulation, and that signature Stone Island edge. Features include a padded design, iconic sleeve badge, and premium streetwear appeal. A rare, standout piece in excellent vintage condition.

Key Features:
- Condition: Excellent vintage
- Brand: Stone Island
- Size: Large
- Color: Green
- Garment Dyed Down_26 GR X SQM_N technology
- Lightweight insulation
- Padded design
- Iconic sleeve badge
- Premium streetwear appeal
- Authentic Stone Island

A must-have for collectors and fans of high-end streetwear. Fast shipping and secure checkout at HappyDeel.
